com.stickycoding.Rokon
Class Hotspot

java.lang.Object
  com.stickycoding.Rokon.Hotspot

public class Hotspot
extends java.lang.Object

Hotspot class is used as a way of simplying the detection of touches on the screen, and triggers onHotspotTouched
